name: vtk

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

variants.name: examples
variants.description: Enable building & installing the VTK examples

description:
The Visualization Toolkit (VTK) is an open-source, freely available
software system for 3D computer graphics, image processing and
visualization.

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: cgns
dependencies.description:
The CFD General Notation System (CGNS) provides a general, portable, and
extensible standard for the storage and retrieval of computational fluid
dynamics (CFD) analysis data.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: double-conversion
dependencies.description:
This project (double-conversion) provides binary-decimal and decimal-
binary routines for IEEE doubles. The library consists of efficient
conversion routines that have been extracted from the V8 JavaScript
engine. The code has been refactored and improved so that it can be used
more easily in other projects. There is extensive documentation in
src/double-conversion.h. Other examples can be found in
test/cctest/test-conversions.cc.

dependencies.name: eigen
dependencies.description:
Eigen is a C++ template library for linear algebra matrices, vectors,
numerical solvers, and related algorithms.

dependencies.name: expat
dependencies.description: Expat is an XML parser library written in C.

dependencies.name: ffmpeg
dependencies.description:
FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and
stream audio and video.

dependencies.name: freetype
dependencies.description:
FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts. It is
written in C, designed to be small, efficient, highly customizable, and
portable while capable of producing high-quality output (glyph images)
of most vector and bitmap font formats.

dependencies.name: gl
dependencies.description: Shim package for the core OpenGL library from Apple

dependencies.name: gl2ps
dependencies.description:
GL2PS is a C library providing high quality vector output for any OpenGL
application.

dependencies.name: glew
dependencies.description: The OpenGL Extension Wrangler Library.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: jpeg
dependencies.description:
libjpeg-turbo is a fork of the original IJG libjpeg which uses SIMD to
accelerate baseline JPEG compression and decompression. libjpeg is a
library that implements JPEG image encoding, decoding and transcoding.

dependencies.name: jsoncpp
dependencies.description:
JsonCpp is a C++ library that allows manipulating JSON values, including
serialization and deserialization to and from strings. It can also
preserve existing comment in unserialization/serialization steps, making
it a convenient format to store user input files.

dependencies.name: libogg
dependencies.description:
Ogg is a multimedia container format, and the native file and stream
format for the Xiph.org multimedia codecs.

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: libtheora
dependencies.description: Theora Video Compression.

dependencies.name: libtiff
dependencies.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependencies.name: libxt
dependencies.description: libXt - X Toolkit Intrinsics library.

dependencies.name: lz4
dependencies.description:
LZ4 is lossless compression algorithm, providing compression speed at
400 MB/s per core, scalable with multi-cores CPU. It also features an
extremely fast decoder, with speed in multiple GB/s per core, typically
reaching RAM speed limits on multi-core systems.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MPICH is a high performance and widely portable implementation of the
Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard.

dependencies.name: netcdf-c
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.

dependencies.name: netcdf-cxx4
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C++ distribution.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependencies.name: nlohmann-json
dependencies.description: JSON for Modern C++

dependencies.name: proj
dependencies.description:
PROJ is a generic coordinate transformation software, that transforms
geospatial coordinates from one coordinate reference system (CRS) to
another. This includes cartographic projections as well as geodetic
transformations.

dependencies.name: pugixml
dependencies.description: Light-weight, simple, and fast XML parser for C++ with XPath support

dependencies.name: py-mpi4py
dependencies.description:
This package provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface
(MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/MPI-2
specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++
bindings.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependencies.name: qt
dependencies.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.

dependencies.name: seacas
dependencies.description:
The SEACAS Project contains the Exodus and IOSS I/O libraries and a
collection of applications which create, query, modify, or translate
Exodus databases. Exodus is a finite element mesh and results database
file format. Default is to build the Exodus and IOSS libraries and the
io_shell, io_info, io_modify, struc_to_unstruc apps.

dependencies.name: sqlite
dependencies.description:
SQLite is a C-language library that implements a small, fast, self-
contained, high-reliability, full-featured, SQL database engine.

dependencies.name: utf8cpp
dependencies.description:
A simple, portable and lightweight generic library for handling UTF-8
encoded strings.

dependencies.name: xz
dependencies.description:
XZ Utils is free general-purpose data compression software with high
compression ratio. XZ Utils were written for POSIX-like systems, but
also work on some not-so-POSIX systems. XZ Utils are the successor to
LZMA Utils.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.

dependent_to.name: discotec
dependent_to.description:
This project contains DisCoTec, a code for the distributed sparse grid
combination technique with MPI parallelization.

dependent_to.name: ftk
dependent_to.description:
FTK is a library that simplifies, scales, and delivers feature tracking
algorithms for scientific data.

dependent_to.name: libmesh
dependent_to.description:
The libMesh library provides a framework for the numerical simulation of
partial differential equations using arbitrary unstructured
discretizations on serial and parallel platforms.

dependent_to.name: gxsview
dependent_to.description:
Gxsview is a stand-alone multi-platform integrated tool to visualize
input data of Monte Carlo radiation transport calculation code, MCNP5,
and PHITS3. It consists of 3D, 2D, cross-section, and input file
viewers. Also, this software is capable of exporting in 2D(png, jpg, and
xpm) or 3D(stl, vtk, vtp and ply) formats.

dependent_to.name: kassiopeia
dependent_to.description: Simulation of electric and magnetic fields and particle tracking.

dependent_to.name: sensei
dependent_to.description:
SENSEI is a platform for scalable in-situ analysis and visualization.
Its design motto is "Write once, run everywhere", this means that once
the application is instrumented with SENSEI it can use existing and
future analysis backends. Existing backends include: Paraview/Catalyst,
Visit/Libsim, ADIOS, Python scripts, and so on.

dependent_to.name: mmg
dependent_to.description:
Mmg is an open source software for simplicial remeshing. It provides 3
applications and 4 libraries: - the mmg2d application and the libmmg2d
library: adaptation and optimization of a two-dimensional triangulation
and generation of a triangulation from a set of points or from given
boundary edges - the mmgs application and the libmmgs library:
adaptation and optimization of a surface triangulation and isovalue
discretization - the mmg3d application and the libmmg3d library:
adaptation and optimization of a tetrahedral mesh and implicit domain
meshing - the libmmg library gathering the libmmg2d, libmmgs and
libmmg3d libraries.

dependent_to.name: fsl
dependent_to.description:
FSL is a comprehensive library of analysis tools for FMRI, MRI and DTI
brain imaging data.

dependent_to.name: memsurfer
dependent_to.description:
MemSurfer is a tool to compute and analyze membrane surfaces found in a
wide variety of large-scale molecular simulations.

dependent_to.name: visit
dependent_to.description:
VisIt is an Open Source, interactive, scalable, visualization, animation
and analysis tool.

dependent_to.name: py-damask
dependent_to.description: Pre- and post-processing tools for DAMASK

dependent_to.name: dealii
dependent_to.description:
C++ software library providing well-documented tools to build finite
element codes for a broad variety of PDEs.

dependent_to.name: py-mayavi
dependent_to.description: Mayavi: 3D visualization of scientific data in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-mne
dependent_to.description: MNE python project for MEG and EEG data analysis.

dependent_to.name: f3d
dependent_to.description: A fast and minimalist scriptable 3D viewer.

dependent_to.name: parmmg
dependent_to.description: ParMMG is a parallel remesher based on MMG

dependent_to.name: opencascade
dependent_to.description:
Open CASCADE Technology is a software development kit (SDK) intended for
development of applications dealing with 3D CAD data, freely available
in open source. It includes a set of C++ class libraries providing
services for 3D surface and solid modeling, visualization, data exchange
and rapid application development.

dependent_to.name: fenics
dependent_to.description:
FEniCS is organized as a collection of interoperable components that
together form the FEniCS Project. These components include the problem-
solving environment DOLFIN, the form compiler FFC, the finite element
tabulator FIAT, the just-in-time compiler Instant / Dijitso, the code
generation interface UFC, the form language UFL and a range of
additional components.

dependent_to.name: geant4
dependent_to.description:
Geant4 is a toolkit for the simulation of the passage of particles
through matter. Its areas of application include high energy, nuclear
and accelerator physics, as well as studies in medical and space
science.

dependent_to.name: opencv
dependent_to.description:
OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer
vision and machine learning software library.

dependent_to.name: freecad
dependent_to.description:
FreeCAD is an open-source parametric 3D modeler made primarily to design
real-life objects of any size. Parametric modeling allows you to easily
modify your design by going back into your model history to change its
parameters.

dependent_to.name: liggghts
dependent_to.description: Discrete element method particle simulation.

dependent_to.name: lammps
dependent_to.description:
LAMMPS stands for Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel
Simulator.

dependent_to.name: t8code
dependent_to.description:
t8code is a C/C++ library to manage parallel adaptive meshes with
various element types. t8code uses a collection (a forest) of multiple
connected adaptive space-trees in parallel and scales to at least one
million MPI ranks and over one Trillion mesh elements.

dependent_to.name: py-postcactus
dependent_to.description:
This repository contains a Python package named PostCactus for
postprocessing data from numerical simulations performed with the
Einstein Toolkit.

dependent_to.name: py-pyvista
dependent_to.description: Easier Pythonic interface to VTK.

dependent_to.name: py-fury
dependent_to.description: Free Unified Rendering in Python.

dependent_to.name: openfoam
dependent_to.description:
OpenFOAM is a GPL-opensource C++ CFD-toolbox. This offering is supported
by OpenCFD Ltd, producer and distributor of the OpenFOAM software via
www.openfoam.com, and owner of the OPENFOAM trademark. OpenCFD Ltd has
been developing and releasing OpenFOAM since its debut in 2004.
